title: TikTok Causing Tics? Brave Director Legitimizes Conspiracies 9.7.21
itunes:title: TikTok Causing Tics? Brave Director Legitimizes Conspiracies 9.7.21
description:
In episode 983, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian You Can Tell Me Anything host Teresa Lee to discuss Gen Z developing tics from the internet, how to help women in Texas, the movie Moonfall, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Help Crowdfund Teresa's Short Film!
  2. Was It an Invisible Attack on U.S. Diplomats, or Something Stranger?
  3. Gen Z Is Developing Unexplained Tics After Going Online, And Doctors Are Concerned
  4. ‘They’re Hunting Us’: Texas Abortion Mutual Aid Fund Prepares For Effects Of New Law
  5. Fuck it. Let's get nuts.
  6. Abortion funds and beyond: Here are the best ways to help Texans
  7. Moonfall: Exclusive Official Teaser Trailer (2022) Halle Berry, Patrick Wilson, Roland Emmerich
  8. Moonfall is a disaster movie about the Moon falling
  9. Moonfall Looks Like Roland Emmerich's Loudest, Dumbest Disaster Movie Yet
  10. Midway: A Conversation with Director Roland Emmerich
  11. What If a Large Asteroid Were to Hit the Moon?
  12. LISTEN: Little Simz - Two Worlds Apart (Official Audio)
